data.name: Atomic Layer Deposition
data.description: Sequential gas pulses deposit film layers one molecule thick.
data.rawText: Refinery 2 MASS 2 Rad-Hard Atomic Layer Deposition

data.name: Ilmenite Semiconductor Film
data.description: Photovoltaic cells locally produced from ISRU ilmenite.
data.rawText: Refinery 2 MASS 6 Rad-Hard Ilmenite Semiconductor Film

data.name: Basalt Fiber Spinning
data.description: Molten basalt (a common igneous rock) is spun into fibers for fiberglass composites.
data.rawText: Refinery 3 MASS 5 Rad-Hard Basalt Fiber Spinning

data.name: Von Neumann Santa Claus Machine
data.description: This mass spectrometer sorts atoms by molecular weight. Any desired product is built atom by atom. -1 ISRU for Colocated ISRU platform.
data.rawText: Refinery 2 MASS 5 Rad-Hard Von Neumann Santa Claus Machine

data.name: CVD Molding
data.description: In the presence of sunlight and carbon monoxide, metal vapors form complex parts in a foundry. Power: 0.2 MWe

data.name: Carbonyl Volatilization
data.description: Gaseous carbon monoxide used as a catalyst for refining metals. -3 to Colocated size rolls on S sites. Power: 0.35 MWe

data.name: Carbo-Chlorination
data.description: Metal refining by forming chloride salts. Oven Power: 1 MWe

data.name: Solar Carbotherm
data.description: Sintered Al from power tower. Power: 500 MWth / 1 MWe. Thrust: 293 kN. ARCOLOGY: Decommissioning of a robonaut is not needed when industrializing in Venus/Earth zones.

data.name: Electroforming
data.description: A mold electroplated with nickel or iron forms a thin-walled finished product. Power: 1 MWe

data.name: Impact Mold Sinter
data.description: Metal grains are blown onto a mold with such force that they fuse into the final shape. -1 to Colocated size rolls. Power: 100 kWe
data.rawText: Refinery 3 MASS 5 Rad-Hard Impact Mold Sinter

data.name: Fluidized Bed
data.description: Gas-entrained fines are processed in an oven. Power: 1 MWe

data.name: Atmospheric Scoop
data.description: Atmospheric scoop. SCOOP: Makes adjacent/co-located aerostat sites double water. Power: 60 MWe. Efficiency: 22%

data.name: Foamglass Sintering
data.description: Native glass fines are foamed at 1200 K, ground to a fine powder, then laser-annealed at 900 K.

data.name: Laser-heated Pedestal Growth
data.description: Ultra-pure crystals and metamaterials from laser-induced high speed convection. SUPERLENS: -1 to all Colocated raygun size rolls.
data.rawText: Refinery 1 MASS 5 Rad-Hard Laser-heated Pedestal Growth

data.name: Froth Flotation
data.description: In a water, hydrocarbon, or silicone-based bath, minerals are separated from gangue by differences in hydrophobicity.

data.name: Femtochemistry
data.description: Femtosecond x-ray laser pulses target individual bonds during chemical reaction transition states. SCAVENGING: If Colocated, doubles FTs during site refuel.

data.name: ISRU Sabatier
data.description: Produces methane and oxygen using hydrogen and atmospheric carbon dioxide. Power: 1 MWe. Nozzle: 53 kN @ 0.38 ks

data.name: Biophytolytic Algal Farm
data.description: A microbial sludge extracts hydrogen & minerals from ores. Power: 100 kWth. Efficiency: 1%. COMET LICHEN: +2 to Colocated size rolls on D sites.
data.rawText: Refinery 3 MASS 5 Rad-Hard Biophytolytic Algal Farm

data.name: In-Situ Leaching
data.description: Leaching solution is injected or sprayed into an ore body and the pregnant solution is recovered and purified.

data.name: Termite Nest
data.description: In situ dwelling is improved by nano-robots cutting structural clay from local materials. MINE REVIVAL: As an Op, remove a barricaded claim on a Colocated Site.

data.name: Magma Electrolysis
data.description: Electricity through molten regolith liberates O2 in an oven. Power: 3.5 MWe

data.name: Ionosphere Lasing
data.description: Two orbiting mirrors use the ionosphere as a lasing medium. Power: 40 MW laser beam. IONOSAT: If used to Industrialize an Atmospheric Site, gain Powersat faction privilege.

data.name: Supercritical Drying
data.description: Aerogels, the lowest density solids known, are synthesized by replacing a wet gel with supercritical CO2 & then depressurizing. Power: 1 MWe

data.name: Solid Flame
data.description: Combustion reactor creating conditions for self-propagating high temperature synthesis. JELLYBOTS: Colocated industrialization is a free action.
